title: level up rewards
body:
how do i get these stuff upon level uping, i just made an acc, im already lvl 2 and i didnt reseve anything.
im talking about this http://levelup.lol.garena.com/

replies.body:
those are only for Garena, who have the rights to publish league but do their own thing aside from riot..

so basically
that's not a riot thing, it's a Garena thing, so it's ONLY for garena.

Basically what Wolfess said. Garena has the right to do some special things on their own. I can't say if this type of level up system will come to NA, but if you like it I'd suggest posting this over in Gameplay or Client Discussion. That way it'll get more visibility and something may eventually come of it!
